changeSet.author: Rama Prabhu R
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE employee_db.department ( DEPARTMENT_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, DEPARTMENT_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, DEPARTMENT_HEAD VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, INS_USER INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, LAST_UPDATE_USER INT(11) NULL, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP NULL, PRIMARY KEY (DEPARTMENT_ID) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;
